jdbcService.sql: update workflow_transition_instance set definition_id = case when :definitionId is null then definition_id else :definitionId end, workflow_id = case when :workflowId is null then workflow_id else :workflowId end, parent_id = case when :parentId is null then parent_id else :parentId end, actor_id = case when :actorId is null then actor_id else :actorId end, system_id = case when :systemId is null then system_id else :systemId end, started = case when :started is null then started else :started end, stopped = case when :stopped is null then stopped else :stopped end, log = case when :log is null then log else :log end, error_log = case when :errorLog is null then error_log else :errorLog end, error_code = case when :errorCode is null then error_code else :errorCode end, sequence = case when :sequence is null then sequence else :sequence end, transition_state = case when :transitionState is null then transition_state else :transitionState end, from_state_id = case when :fromStateId is null then from_state_id else :fromStateId end, to_state_id = case when :toStateId is null then to_state_id else :toStateId end where id = :id
